{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=LG6100D |revision=-1SNNAS |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |fcc_date=11/13/2013 |fcc_id=PY313200235, PY3NM7371 |pcb_id=2976460101 |type=LTE gateway, LTE router, wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PXB 4210;Lantiq, PXB 4210 EL, V1.2, XWAY GRX288, 7G20504B02, H1237; |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR-BC |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16GG-AC |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9882;QCA9882-BR4A, NGA455.002C, 1320, KOREA; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9227;AR9227-BC1A, PPY076.001C, 1321, CHINA; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_chip1_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip1_model=PEF 7071V |eth_chip2_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip2_model=PEF 7071V |eth_chip3_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip3_model=PEF 7071V |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1-port GbE PHY;Lantiq;PEF 7071V;Lantiq, PEF7071V, V1.5, CBE H1317;3; |flags=LTE, SIM Card slot, TR-069, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.32; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=SprintGateway-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^SprintGateway-[A-Fa-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=C4:04:15 |oui_eth=C4:04:15 }} {{TagLine|LTE Data Gateway}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.netgear.com/service-providers/products/mobile/lte-gateways/LG6100D.aspx}} {{â€¢}} [http://www.netgear.com/images/pdf/LG6100D_Sprint_datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
"2976460101" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|Netgear PCB ID|Delta Networks}} *{{WiFiCert|WFA51210|01/15/2014}}
It looks to be targeted for use w/ {{Used by service|Sprint}}'s service :<small>(or at least the '''LG6100D-1SNNAS''' model)</small>. This device has a FE (10/100) WAN connection.
*CPU: [[Lantiq]] XWAY GRX288 (PXB 4210 EL V1.2)
